item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 18, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Two new PebbleOS watches (813 points | 300 comments)
2. Apple restricts Pebble from being awesome with iPhones (930 points | 582 comments)
3. Show HN: I made a tool to port tweets to Bluesky mantaining their original date (208 points | 75 comments)
4. Show HN: "Git who" – A new CLI tool for industrial-scale Git blaming (38 points | 14 comments)
5. HTTrack Website Copier (96 points | 22 comments)
6. A Tale of Four Kernels [pdf] (2008) (22 points | 3 comments)
7. Karatsuba Matrix Multiplication and Its Efficient Hardware Implementations (24 points | discuss)
8. US appeals court rules AI generated art cannot be copyrighted (331 points | 209 comments)
9. Google to buy Wiz for $32B (342 points | 524 comments)
10. Designing Electronics That Work (94 points | 31 comments)
11. Amazon to kill off local Alexa processing, all voice requests shipped to cloud (308 points | 76 comments)
12. Preview: Amazon S3 Tables and Lakehouse in DuckDB (95 points | 26 comments)
13. The race is on to build the most complex machine (72 points | 32 comments)
14. Turkish university annuls Erdogan rival's degree, preventing run for president (95 points | 23 comments)
15. PeerTube v7.1 Is Out (88 points | 18 comments)
16. Spaceium Inc (YC S24) Is Hiring a Software Engineer ( | hide)
17. Verification-First Development (33 points | 14 comments)
18. This is no world for an axolotl (57 points | 21 comments)
19. Fedora 42 Beta (135 points | 63 comments)
20. Rust on the RP2350 (2024) (118 points | 31 comments)
21. 20 Years of YC / HN (72 points | 16 comments)
22. Show HN: I made a live multiplayer Minesweeper game (149 points | 60 comments)
23. SheepIt Render Farm server code goes open source (123 points | 17 comments)
24. Stamina Is a Quiet Advantage (139 points | 62 comments)
25. Nvidia Dynamo: A Datacenter Scale Distributed Inference Serving Framework (43 points | 7 comments)
26. Ask HN: How Do I Escape Homelessness After Rebuilding My Mental Health? (96 points | 58 comments)
27. FTC Removes Posts Critical of Amazon, Microsoft, and AI Companies (240 points | 75 comments)
28. Block YouTube ads on AppleTV by decrypting and stripping ads from Profobuf (2022) (619 points | 378 comments)
29. Practical Process Control: Methods and Best Practices for Automatic PID Control (28 points | 1 comment)
30. Underrated Soft Skills: Charisma (73 points | 78 comments)
